title: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir/interpret/place.rs:41: expected wide pointer extra data (e.g. slice length or trait object vtable)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
```rust
#![feature(unsized_fn_params)]

pub fn take_unsized_slice(s: [u8]) {
    s[0];
}
```

([Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=5c887eb2ff4ee3df7142d6c75490bb0c))
